title: Sarah Steck, 28, a “bright light” with a dark artistic style, among victims of Denver, Lakewood shooting spree
content:
1. Sarah Steck, 28, a “bright light” with a dark artistic style, among victims of Denver, Lakewood shooting spree  The Denver Post
  2. Denver Gunman Lyndon McLeod Spouted Violent Views Online for Years, Wrote 'the Weak Better Buckle Up'  The Daily Beast

  4. Lakewood officer’s ‘heroic’ actions saved lives  FOX 31 Denver

localize.title: デンバーとレイクウッドの銃乱射事件の犠牲者に、暗い芸術的スタイルを持つ「明るい光」サラ・ステックさん（28歳）が含まれている。
28岁的莎拉-斯特克是丹佛、湖木枪击案的受害者之一，她是一盏具有黑暗艺术风格的 "明灯"
28歲的莎拉-斯特克是丹佛、湖木槍擊案的受害者之一，她是一盞具有黑暗藝術風格的 "明燈"
